title: Family Emergency Preparedness Training October 13 to November 17 (City of Malibu, CA)
text: ( Source : City of Malibu, CA ) Residents can learn how to be prepared to protect their family during wildfires, floods, earthquakes, and other natural disasters at the Family Emergency Preparedness Training classes, offered by the Los Angeles
